title: European Banking Authority 2017 Transparency Exercise
body:
Deutsche Bank (XETRA: DBKGn.DE / NYSE: DB) announces that the data related to the 2017 EU-wide Transparency Exercise of the European Banking Authority (EBA) are available on the EBA website (www.eba.europa.eu).
For further information please contact:
Deutsche Bank AG
Media Contact
Investor Relations
Christian Streckert
